title: Who are good adc/dmg dealers?
body: I am kind of new to the game and was wondering who to get for adc or just plain damage.

replies.body:
If you're new to the game then Graves or Tristan could be good for straight damage. If you want the most possible damage then get some experience and pick up Draven. He's really fun and his spinning axes act like critical strikes that are guaranteed. Get some crit on him and you just about double his damage in the mid game. 

He is mechanically demanding, though, and your positioning has to be decent.
{{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:18}} . They are adcs and they do more than plain damage.

Lucian and graves are my two favs. Theyre caster type adc's where you dont focus just on auto attacking as much as possible, but more of weaving auto attacks in between your spells. Vayne is strong against tanks, jinx does alot of area dmg, caitlyn is the long range poke adc, corki is a bursty adc, and tristana is great all around

Plain damage?  {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:96}} and {{champion:29}} if you can get a good ult off.  Vayne eats tanks for breakfast.  jinx does so much AoE with her rockets it's scary.  Kog'Maw is the definition of hyper carry for late game.  Twitch is harder but if you ever see a twitch pull off a good ult you would know what I mean when I say he brings the damage.  I've seen a full build Twitch in late game kill an entire team that got caught in the jungle in under 3 seconds....it was scary.
